summary: The document is a forensic analysis report from ABC Forensic Services Laboratory regarding the restoration of a serial number on a Glock 17 pistol. The originally obliterated serial number was restored to XXX999US. A query revealed that the firearm was reported stolen by Mark Toler in 2002.
conclusion: The serial number XXX999US was restored on the Glock 17 pistol, and it was found to be reported stolen by Mark Toler in 2002.

events.details: Restoration of the serial number on a Glock 17 pistol.
The firearm was reported stolen by Mark Toler.

description: Black in color Glock 17 pistol, 9x19 mm caliber with restored serial number XXX999US
Unloaded black in color Glock 9mm magazine
